Key Match Events: Bam Adebayo flirted with a triple-double with 23 points, 9 rebounds, and 10 assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans have lost 29 out of their last 32 games and are 1-20 in their last 21 contests
Others: Trey Murphy III scored 34 for the Pelicans
Jimmy Butler, in his first game following a five-game absence because of illness, had 9 points, 4 rebounds, and 2 assists in 25 minutes on 3-for-5 shooting
Miami is now 12-9 in games where Butler plays this season
